coreAttributes.name: Power Cola
coreAttributes.description: A futuristic can of soda, emblazoned with the 'Power Cola' logo.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/20)] [##npc.incrementMana(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_MANA_MAXIMUM)/20)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(feel)] the rush of Power Cola energy!

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 1)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: After first popping up the tab, [npc.name] [npc.verb(bring)] the can of Power Cola up to [npc.her] [npc.mouth].
